title: Mayuri Chandbali - Exquisite Peacock Jhumka Earrings
materials: and dazzling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. The gold boasts a fine Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: These captivating earrings feature a traditional Chandbali design adorned with a beautifully crafted peacock (Mayuri). The peacock motif is intricately designed. The earrings feature a cluster setting for the CZ stones at the top and a delicate bead drop at the bottom for added elegance. The setting is masterfully handcrafted using traditional South Indian techniques.
colors: The earrings showcase a vibrant color palette with the warm glow of 22K gold
and the sparkling white of CZ stones. This harmonious blend of colors embodies the richness of South Indian aesthetics.
occasions: or to add a touch of regal charm to your everyday attire. They also complement modern ensembles beautifully
making them ideal for cocktail parties and special events.
description: This piece embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The peacock motif is symbolic of beauty, royalty, and prosperity. The use of high-quality materials and the intricate design ensure both durability and timeless elegance, making it a treasured heirloom.
